## correspondence.Api.email() method

Opens pre-populated email window.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
email(request: EmailRequest): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [EmailRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.correspondence.emailrequest.md) | the create request. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

};
